devdoc.details: Supports both native tokens (cBTC) and ERC20 tokens (CUSD)      Uses share-based accounting where exchange rate increases over time

AddressEmptyCode(address).details: There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract).

AddressInsufficientBalance(address).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

FailedInnerCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC20 token failed.

accrueYield().details: Can be called by anyone to update yield

params._isNativeToken: Whether this vault uses native token
params._tokenAddress: Address of the ERC20 token (address(0) for native token)

deposit(uint256).details: For native token: uses msg.value, amount parameter ignored      For ERC20: transfers amount from user

params.amount: Amount of ERC20 tokens to deposit (ignored for native)

returns.balance: Current token balance including accrued yield

devdoc.title: MockYieldVault

accrueYield().notice: Accrues yield based on time elapsed

getBalance(address).notice: Gets current balance (principal + yield) for a user

getContractBalance().notice: Gets the contract's current token balance

getExchangeRate().notice: Gets the current exchange rate (tokens per share)

isNativeToken().notice: Whether this vault uses native token (true) or ERC20 (false)

shares(address).notice: Mapping of user addresses to their vault shares

tokenAddress().notice: Address of the ERC20 token (address(0) if native token)

totalDeposits().notice: Total tokens deposited (principal only, excludes yield)

userdoc.notice: Mock yield-generating vault for demo purposes (simulates AAVE-like behavior)
